game.name: Lobsterpunk
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lockpick your way through an abandoned city powered solely by the combustion of lobsters. Bring the dead machinery one last breath of life before their steel forms lay cold forever. As you do, see the memories of the last man on earth, and how familiar that might feel, however foreign the setting.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lockpick your way through an abandoned city powered solely by the combustion of lobsters.
